title: Manage Contract Versions
description: During a lengthy negotiation, multiple versions of a contract are being exchanged. A paralegal needs to manage version control.

tasks.description: Save each new version of the contract with a clear naming convention (e.g., 'Agreement_v3_2024-07-15').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent saves the document with a logical name.

tasks.description: Use a document comparison tool to create a redline showing the changes between the latest version and the prior version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comparison document that clearly highlights all changes.

tasks.description: Share the redline with the legal team to easily review the changes made by the other side.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team can efficiently review the latest round of negotiations.
